this info is a fact! and does not base on any personal claims since I like her as a person but the fact is that she became well-known because of the sex tape
this article is in general far from NEUTRAL. It is TOTALY biased towards MRS Hilton. The FACT is that she became famous because of her self made film.
/* Controversy */ if "nude", the "only" is redundant and vice versa

/* Personal life */ come back with a source
/* Personal life */ article subject should be referred to by last name
/* Products and endorsements */ The name of the product was wrong. What about the rest of the report?
/* Controversy */ Removed ref to "Paris Hilton lookalike". Based on the image we have, "lookalike" is going too far.
/* Controversy */ reworded to reduce hyperbole and unreferenced opinion. Also put unrelated items in separate paragraphs
/* Controversy */ this phrase is not supported by citation, violates [[WP:NPOV]] and [[WP:SYN]]
/* Controversy */ added info and refs to expand the article
/* Controversy */ added to article. added references.
/* Controversy */ re-edit to make section cohesive. Removed tag. Per Wikipedia:Trivia sections and Wikipedia:Handling trivia there is no trivia '''list''' to be so tagged. User is sharing an opinion
Removed tag. Per [[Wikipedia:Trivia sections]] and [[Wikipedia:Handling trivia]] there is no trivia list to be so tagged. User is sharing an [[opinion]] not a fact
this has nothing to do with paris hilton and violates [[WP:ADVERT]]. please conform your sources per [[WP:CITE]]
/* Parody */ removed tag. Placed improperly in violation of wiki guidelines. There is no "list" of trivia.
/* Exploitation */ returned information removed in error and expanded article. Added references to prove the information.
/* Parody */ move tag to top of section
unsupported by reference, rm bad ref (blog)
reverted - please stop including this info. it is too much based on personal opinion.
yes I think she is firstly known because of this film and gained most attention from it. everything else comes second
remove controversial opinion statement, in accord with BLP policy, also correct grammar
retitled section and subsections to better reflect content. Removed unneccessary bullet to discourage a list lists

Removed category: Paris was born in New York. She may have visited Bavaria,,, she may have relatives in Bavaria... but she is NOT from Bavaria.

rm bulleted, irrelevant [[WP:TRIVIA|trivia]], please wait for a consensus before readding this information
this is not acting...its a reality !

I removed image again. If there is no good reason to include it, it should not be included. I have raised the issue at Wikipedia talk:Biographies of living persons.
rv - not to have any statement on the usefulness of the picture, but i don't see any BLP grounds to omit it, unless you're suggesting association with her is libelous to the hiltons?
I removed image based on BLP. Paris is much better known than the rest of her family. IMO, naming family members in the article is not essential & not a good reason to include this photo.
